Code ReferenceÔÉÅ

This section documents the key modules and functions in Django_C.

class portfolio.views.CustomLoginView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: LoginView

Custom login view using ‚Äòportfolio/login.html‚Äô instead of the default template.

This view provides authentication functionality while ensuring users log in using a designated template.

template_name = 'portfolio/login.html'
portfolio.views.about(request)[source]

Render the ‚ÄòAbout‚Äô page with information about the portfolio.

portfolio.views.contact(request)[source]

Render the ‚ÄòContact‚Äô page for user inquiries and messages.

portfolio.views.home(request)[source]

Render the homepage displaying an overview of the portfolio.

portfolio.views.logout_view(request)[source]

Handle user logout via a secure POST request.

Logs out the currently authenticated user and redirects them to the homepage.

portfolio.views.poll_detail(request, poll_id)[source]

Display detailed information about a selected poll.

Checks whether the logged-in user has already voted on the poll and prevents duplicate voting.

portfolio.views.poll_list(request)[source]

Display all available polls for authenticated users.

Retrieves polls from the database and renders them for user participation.

portfolio.views.project_detail(request, pk)[source]

Render details for a specific project.

Fetches a project instance using its primary key and presents details including title, description, and related content.

portfolio.views.project_list(request)[source]

Render a page displaying all available projects.

Retrieves and displays all projects stored in the database, allowing users to browse project details.

portfolio.views.register_view(request)[source]

Handle user registration by creating a new account.

Ensures unique usernames and password validation before storing user credentials securely in the database.

portfolio.views.vote(request, poll_id)[source]

Handle user voting for a specific poll.

  • Validates that users select a choice before submitting their vote.

  • Ensures users cannot vote more than once per poll.

  • Records the vote in the database while updating the choice count.

Models for the portfolio app.

Defines the Project model and Poll system, including voting restrictions.

class portfolio.models.Choice(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Represents a selectable voting option within a poll.

poll

The associated poll.

Type:

Poll

choice_text

The text label describing the choice.

Type:

str

votes

The number of votes this choice has received.

Type:

int

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

choice_text

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>
poll

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

poll_id
vote_set

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

votes

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

image1

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

image2

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

image3

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

class portfolio.models.Vote(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Tracks user votes within a poll, ensuring each user votes only once.

poll

The poll being voted on.

Type:

Poll

user

The user casting the vote.

Type:

User

choice

The selected choice by the user.

Type:

Choice

Constraints:

  • Users can only vote once per poll.

  • A vote is tied to a poll and a specific choice.
